lineage.Process: SpatialAutocorrelation soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode # INVERSE_DISTANCE EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW # # #
SpatialAutocorrelation soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode # INVERSE_DISTANCE EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW 30 # #
SpatialAutocorrelation soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode # K_NEAREST_NEIGHBORS EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW 30 # 300
SpatialAutocorrelation soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode # FIXED_DISTANCE_BAND EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW 500 # #
SpatialAutocorrelation soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode GENERATE_REPORT FIXED_DISTANCE_BAND EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW 500 # #
SpatialAutocorrelation soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode GENERATE_REPORT FIXED_DISTANCE_BAND EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW 1000 # #

ExportFeatures soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 C:\Users\AntFonseca\spatialAutocorrelation\output2\lisa_1990_1000m.shp # NOT_USE_ALIAS "SOURCE_ID "SOURCE_ID" false false true 4 Long 0 0,First,#,C:\Users\AntFonseca\spatialAutocorrelation\input\soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033.shp,FID,-1,-1;gridcode "gridcode" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,C:\Users\AntFonseca\spatialAutocorrelation\input\soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033.shp,gridcode,-1,-1" #
ClustersOutliers soybeanCorrentina1990_ESRI102033 gridcode C:\Users\AntFonseca\spatialAutocorrelation\output2\lisa_1990_1000m.shp FIXED_DISTANCE_BAND EUCLIDEAN_DISTANCE ROW 1000 # NO_FDR 499 #

SpatialJoin LISA\lisa_1990_1000m lisa_2020_1000m C:\Users\AntFonseca\spatialAutocorrelation\output2\spatial_join_lisa1990_2020.shp JOIN_ONE_TO_ONE KEEP_ALL "SOURCE_ID "SOURCE_ID" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,SOURCE_ID,-1,-1;gridcode "gridcode" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,gridcode,-1,-1;LMiIndex "LMiIndex" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,LMiIndex,-1,-1;LMiZScore "LMiZScore" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,LMiZScore,-1,-1;LMiPValue "LMiPValue" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,LMiPValue,-1,-1;COType "COType" true true false 8 Text 0 0,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,COType,0,7;NNeighbors "NNeighbors" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,NNeighbors,-1,-1;ZTransform "ZTransform" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,ZTransform,-1,-1;SpatialLag "SpatialLag" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,LISA\lisa_1990_1000m,SpatialLag,-1,-1;SOURCE_I_1 "SOURCE_ID" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,SOURCE_ID,-1,-1;gridcode_1 "gridcode" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,gridcode,-1,-1;LMiIndex_1 "LMiIndex" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,LMiIndex,-1,-1;LMiZScor_1 "LMiZScore" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,LMiZScore,-1,-1;LMiPValu_1 "LMiPValue" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,LMiPValue,-1,-1;COType_1 "COType" true true false 8 Text 0 0,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,COType,0,7;NNeighbo_1 "NNeighbors" true true false 10 Long 0 10,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,NNeighbors,-1,-1;ZTransfo_1 "ZTransform" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,ZTransform,-1,-1;SpatialL_1 "SpatialLag" true true false 19 Double 0 0,First,#,lisa_2020_1000m,SpatialLag,-1,-1" WITHIN_A_DISTANCE "1 Meters" # #
CalculateField spatial_join_lisa1990_2020 Transition "str(!COType!) + "â†’" + str(!COType_1!)" PYTHON3 # TEXT NO_ENFORCE_DOMAINS
